Author: pop_chip_boi
Text: when i started i had 3 meals, 2 snacks, no exercise - i wasn't allowed to even walk to the bus stop. you need to remember that this is for you, not anyone else, and you are the one who needs help. medicine is not one size fits all; they do not need a prescription for you.  honestly i only got through by telling myself, every day, that tomorrow could be better.   you could also make a list of reasons to recover and call upon it in times of struggle. think of the people who want you to be well; how life will be better when you are well.
